full_description:
Google Pixel Watch

Google Pixel Watch is the first smartwatch to deliver the best of Google and Fitbit. The Pixel Watch features a stunning circular, domed design made of recycled, premium stainless steel for a sleek and environmentally conscious look. Customize your watch with over 20 different bands to match your personal style. The Google Pixel Watch is built to withstand scratches and splashes, ensuring its durability in everyday life. The Pixel Watch is designed to withstand scratches and splashes, ensuring its long-term usability.

Health and fitness from Fitbit

The Google Pixel Watch offers advanced health tracking features thanks to its partnership with Fitbit. Discover Fitbit's most accurate heart rate monitoring technology, use the ECG app for heart health insights, and monitor your health metrics and sleep stages. Your safety is given priority with fall detection and Emergency SOS.

Seamless Pixel Integration

Easily integrate your devices to further improve your Pixel experience. Easily switch between Pixel phones and earbuds, control entertainment on all Pixel devices, and control your connected home from the comfort of your wrist.
